column1: It is not from the benevolence of the butcher
column3: or the baker that we expect our dinner
column4: but from their regard to their own interest. We address ourselves
column5: not to their humanity but to their self-love
column6: and never talk to them of our own necessities but of their advantages.

column1: But this long run is a misleading guide to current affairs. In the long run we are all dead. Economists set themselves too easy
column2: too useless a task if in tempestuous seasons then can only tell us that when the storm is long past the ocean is flat again.

column1: There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: make the best quality goods possible at the lowest cost possible
